languages.text: "Если тебе что-то не нравится — можешь покинуть мой корабль в любой момент".
"If something displeases you, you are to leave my ship at any time."
languages.original_text: "Если тебе что-то не нравится — можешь покинуть мой корабль в любой момент".

traits.locale_text: "If you don't like something — you're free to leave my ship at any time."
"If you don't like something — you're free to leave my ship at any time."
"If something displeases you, you are to leave my ship at any time."
"If something displeases you, you are to leave my ship at any time."
"If something displeases you, you are to leave my ship at any time."

languages.text: “你要是有什么不满，随时都可以离开我的飞船。”
languages.original_text: "If something displeases you, you are to leave my ship at any time."

traits.locale_text: “你要是有什么不满，随时都可以离开我的飞船。”

languages.text: «Si algo te disgusta, puedes abandonar mi nave cuando quieras».
languages.original_text: "If something displeases you, you are to leave my ship at any time."

traits.locale_text: «Si algo te disgusta, puedes abandonar mi nave cuando quieras».

languages.text: « Si mes choix ne vous conviennent pas, vous êtes libre de quitter mon vaisseau quand bon vous semble. »
languages.original_text: "If something displeases you, you are to leave my ship at any time."

traits.locale_text: « Si mes choix ne vous conviennent pas, vous êtes libre de quitter mon vaisseau quand bon vous semble. »

languages.text: "Wenn Euch etwas missfällt, könnt Ihr mein Schiff jederzeit verlassen."
languages.original_text: "If something displeases you, you are to leave my ship at any time."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Euch etwas missfällt, könnt Ihr mein Schiff jederzeit verlassen."

languages.text: 「不愉快だと思うならば、いつでも私の船から出て行ってもらって結構だ」
languages.original_text: "If something displeases you, you are to leave my ship at any time."

traits.locale_text: 「不愉快だと思うならば、いつでも私の船から出て行ってもらって結構だ」

languages.text: "Memnun olmadığın bir şey varsa istediğin zaman gemimden ayrılabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "If something displeases you, you are to leave my ship at any time."

traits.locale_text: "Memnun olmadığın bir şey varsa istediğin zaman gemimden ayrılabilirsin."
